header.survey_title: Foundational Digital Transformation in North-East Romania
header.survey_description:
This research study aims to investigate the effectiveness of the Smart Specialisation Program by rigorously evaluating the adoption of digital technologies by small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in Romania's North-East region.  
The program is designed to provide financial assistance to eligible SMEs, facilitating their acquisition of ICT hardware, development or adaptation of software applications/licenses, acquisition of AI systems, website development, and enhancement of IT infrastructure. By comparing randomly selected program firms and non-selected comparison firms, we seek to establish causal relationships between digitalization and its corresponding outcomes, while also distinguishing the effects for various types of firms.

Non-refundable financial support will be provided to eligible SMEs, with a maximum project contribution of 90% of the eligible investment value.  
Total financial allocation is of 51.4 millions Euros and is carried out by launching calls for projects (min 15.000 Euros, max 100.000 Euros per firm).  
The focus is on increasing digital intensity, supporting the use of digital tools, equipment, and services by creating internet pages, digital promotion, cloud hosting services, e-commerce, digitalization of communication with clients, data collection, buying ICT hardware, and developing or adapting software applications/licenses.

The following 10 questions regard your beliefs on, what is called in technical terms, the intention-to-treat effect (ITT). It is the effect of BEING OFFERED the full program, regardless of whether or not a firm decides to participate. It is simply the mean difference of the outcomes for the firms that get the financial assistance to get digitalized, compared to the firms that do not.
In other words, you will be asked what you think it is the likely impact of the program for the firms that are offered the intervention, compared to those that do not participate to the program.

question1.subtitle_question:
Consider that 100 eligible companies have been selected to participate to the Smart Specialisation Program. What percentages of firms do you think will enrol in the program?
_Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question1.effect_size: What would be the minimum take-up rate you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the take-up rate to be at least 60%, you should give 60 as your answer.

question2.subtitle_question:
On average, how much do you think that the total number of full-time employees would increase in the SMEs beneficiaries of the grant in the first 6 months after firms received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries firms from the comparison group?
_Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question2.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of employees to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question3.subtitle_question:
On average, how much do you think that the labor productivity would increase in the SMEs that were offered the intervention in the first 6 months after firms received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries SMEs from the comparison group?
_Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question3.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the labor productivity to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question4.subtitle_question:
On average, how much do you think that the total annual sales revenue would increase in the SMEs that were offered the intervention in the first 6 months after firms received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries SMEs from the comparison group?
_Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question4.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the total annual sales revenue to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question5.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have ALREADY exported outside Romanian borders before the intervention.**  
On average, how much do you think that the export would increase in the SMEs beneficiaries of the grant that have already exported in the European Union or in the worldwide market in the first 6 months after firms received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries SMEs from the comparison group?
_Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question5.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the export to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question6.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER exported outside Romanian borders before the intervention.**  
On average, how many SMEs that benefited from the grant do you think would start exporting in European Union or in the worldwide market in the first 6 months after receiving the money, compared to non-beneficiaries SMEs from the comparison group?
_Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question6.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the percentage of SMEs starting exporting to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question7.subtitle_question:
On average, how much do you think that the annual profit would increase in the SMEs beneficiaries of the grant in the first 6 months after firms received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries SMEs from the comparison group?
 _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question7.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the annual profit to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question8.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER used an e-commerce service before the intervention.**  
On average, how much do you think that the share of e-commerce users would increase in the SMEs beneficiaries of the grant in the first 6 months after they received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries firms from the comparison group? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question8.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of SMEs using e-commerce to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question9.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER used electronic invoices before the intervention.**  
On average, how much do you think that the share of electronic invoices users would increase in the SMEs beneficiaries of the grant in the first 6 months after they received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries firms from the comparison group? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question9.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of SMEs using electronic invoices to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.

question10.subtitle_question:
**Considering ONLY SMEs that have NEVER used digital advertising before the intervention.**  
 On average, how much do you think that the share of digital advertising users would increase in the SMEs beneficiaries of the grant in the first 6 months after they received the money, compared to non-beneficiaries firms from the comparison group? _Please allocate the probabilities in the cells corresponding to your beliefs._
question10.effect_size: What would be the minimum effect size you would want to see in order to consider scaling up this program to more firms? Express your answer in percentage points, e.g. if you would want the number of SMEs using digital advertising to increase by at least 5%, you should give 5 as your answer.
